ModMetaData.name: Traps Plus (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: shite
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of shites mod https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=34326.0
- Higher quality textures, thanks to Jabbamonkey - You can select the new or old texture by rotating the trap before placing
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://discord.gg/h5TY6DA][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/TrapsPlus][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img]
This is a mod that plans on adding more traps to the Rimworld universe. These are the current traps that are included in the mod: Bear Trap (Rearmable) Spikes Caltrops Body Crusher (Rearmable) Body Slicer (Rearmable) Heat Pad (Powered) Freeze Pad (Powered) Saws (Powered) More will be added in the future :)
If anyone would like to help me with creating better textures, please message me!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Log Uploader[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/2042706367][img]https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/emipa606/TrapsPlus?label=latest%20version&style=plastic&color=9f1111&labelColor=black[/img][/url] | tags: traps, variety
